insertafter.xpath: //block[contains(@name,'Sedan') or contains(@name,'Minivan') or contains(@name,'SUV') or contains(@name,'PickupTruck') or contains(@name,'FireTruck') or contains(@name,'BusSchool') or contains(@name,'PoliceCar') or contains(@name,'SemiTruck')]/drop[@name='terrStone']

insertAfter.xpath: //block[contains(@name,'Minibike') or contains(@name,'Junker') or contains(@name,'Rat') or contains(@name,'HOHVanillaMotorcycle') or @name='GolfCart_b' or @name='DirtBike_b' or @name='Cruiser_b' or @name='Cruiser2_b' or @name='Junker2_b' or @name='DamagedMotoGuppy' or @name='RepairableMotorcycle' or @name='MotorcycleDamaged' or @name='MotorcycleHalfWreck' or @name='MotorcycleShell' or @name='DamagedVespa' or @name='DamagedBrownQuad' or @name='DamagedVespaKart']/property[@name='MaxDamage']
